entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C

Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 09:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 except minus 16 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23 except minus 16 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023
